thread.title: Jim Harbaugh continues to support Colin Kaepernick, insists he'll be on a team soon
thread.title_full: Jim Harbaugh continues to support Colin Kaepernick, insists he'll be on a team soon

author: Nick Baumgardner | nbaumgardner@mlive.com
title: Jim Harbaugh continues to support Colin Kaepernick, insists he'll be on a team soon
text: Jim Harbaugh spent a few days earlier this month making the round on national radio and, almost without exception, he was asked about former San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick. And, certainly without exception, Harbaugh defended his former player completely...
